page.title: 07CHILDREN
page.content: Denholm Primary School is the only school in this area.Like most schools we have three main holidays during the year.The subjects are local history, maths,Atlas,English and project work. The children in our area have lots of things to do such as Guides,Brownies, Redcross,Beavers,Cubs,Scouts,Youth Club and every year we work with the Drama Group.We go on school trips. There is a local Leisure Centre which is just outside our area.We have school sports,the girl and boy with the most points get cups for one year. We have an annual fair on the Green. There is a fancy dress parade,many stalls,demonsrations and Penny Shows. The Flower Show is held in September. Children enter things like soft toys, baking and growing things.Denholm is a nice place.
